rooms.name: Standard Room
rooms.description: A cozy standard room with a queen-size bed and a private bathroom. Perfect for solo travelers or couples. Perfect for a romantic getaway.

rooms.name: Deluxe Room
rooms.description: A spacious deluxe room with a king-size bed, a private bathroom, and a balcony with a view. Perfect for a romantic getaway.
rooms.bathroom: Private bathroom with shower and bathtub

rooms.name: Suite
rooms.description: A luxurious suite with a king-size bed, a private bathroom, a living area, and a balcony with a view. Perfect for families or groups.
rooms.bathroom: Private bathroom with shower and bathtub

rooms.name: Family Room
rooms.description: A spacious family room with two queen-size beds, a private bathroom, and a view of the pool. Perfect for families or groups.

rooms.name: Executive Suite
rooms.description: A luxurious executive suite with a king-size bed, a private bathroom, a living area, and a balcony with a view. Perfect for business travelers or couples.
rooms.bathroom: Private bathroom with shower and bathtub

rooms.name: Honeymoon Suite
rooms.description: A romantic honeymoon suite with a four-poster king-size bed, a private bathroom with a jacuzzi, and a balcony with a view. Perfect for couples celebrating a special occasion.
rooms.bathroom: Private bathroom with shower and jacuzzi

rooms.name: Presidential Suite
rooms.description: A grand presidential suite with two king-size beds, a private bathroom with a jacuzzi and a sauna, a living area, and a balcony with a view. Perfect for VIPs or guests who want to indulge in luxury.
rooms.bathroom: Private bathroom with shower, jacuzzi, and sauna

rooms.name: Penthouse
rooms.description: A luxurious penthouse with three bedrooms, a spacious living area, a private rooftop terrace with a pool, and a breathtaking view of the city. Perfect for guests who want the ultimate luxury experience.
rooms.bed: Two king-size beds, two queen-size beds
rooms.bathroom: Three private bathrooms with shower and bathtub
